dhp62:1: matthi dhanaṃ matthi → puttā matthi dhanammatthi (bj); puttā matthi dhanamatthi (sya-all); puttamatthi dhanamatthi (mr) | hi → attāpi (?)
dhp69:4: atha → atha bālo (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); bālo (mr)
dhp71:4: Bhasmacchannova → bhasmā channova (sya-all, mr); bhasmācchannova (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
